author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: لا إِلهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ وَإِنَّكَ أَنْتَ مَحْبُوبِي فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالآخِرَةِ وَإِنَّكَ أَنْتَ مَقْصُودُ العَارِفِينَ وَالحَمْدُ
translation: No God is there beside Thee, Thou alone art my Beloved in this world and in the world which is to come. Thou alone art the Desire of all them that have recognized Thee.
